title.rendered: How to Restore Deleted Photos on Android

content.rendered:
Have you ever accidentally deleted photos from your phone? Have you ever wished to go back in time to tell yourself not to do it? How about those holiday trip memories, your family’s vacation; the unforgettable birthday party, or the funny moments you captured of your dog which have been deleted by mistake? 

Well, next time you press the wrong button on your phone, don’t you worry about it too much, Dumpster has you covered!

Dumpster is a fantastic recycle bin app available for any Android device. It is by far the best recovery app you can find. We don’t mean to brag, just take a look at some of our reviews.

At Dumpster, we believe that mistakes, like deleting an important photo, shouldn’t be permanent. If you ever accidentally delete a picture from your phone, we will help you recover it, save it, and restore it!
Recovering photos is a very straight forward process. Once you download Dumpster from the Google Play Store, you are just a few steps away from restoring your desired pictures.

How to Restore Deleted Pictures using Dumpster

Here’s the step by step process:

Let’s start with the main issue: you’ve accidentally deleted a picture on your phone. Once Dumpster is up and running, we’ll back up any deleted photos. They will then appear in Dumpster’s Recycle Bin.

Once in Dumpster’s Recycle Bin, simply select the picture you want to restore to your device:

That’s it! The picture is now restored and back to your device gallery.

Restore Anything! Get Dumpster now!
